name: Who Needs A Gun
description:
CONTROL THE ROBOT. KEEP GETTING THROUGH THE ROOMS. DON'T QUESTION WHY.

Who Needs A Gun is a top down positioning-based puzzle game, where you have to trick security turrets into shooting each other to progress through a mysterious building. 

Thank you for playing!

Follow me on Twitter for more of my work in the future:  https://twitter.com/JamesBriggs123

James
